trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that dynamically lays out its contents in a grid composed of rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个面板，它可以在一个由行和列组成的网格中对其内容进行动态布局。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control arranges its contents in a grid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控件将其内容排列在网格中。

trans-unit.source: Because the layout is performed both at design time and run time, it can change dynamically as the application environment changes.
trans-unit.target: 由于布局是同时在设计时和运行时执行的，因此它可随应用程序环境的变化而动态地变化。

trans-unit.source: This gives the controls in the panel the ability to proportionally resize, so it can respond to changes such as the parent control resizing or text length changing due to localization.
trans-unit.target: 这使得面板中的控件能够按比例调整大小，以便能够响应更改（例如父控件的大小调整或本地化产生的文本长度更改）。

trans-unit.source: Any Windows Forms control can be a child of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control, including other instances of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 任何 Windows 窗体控件均可以是 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控制的子控件，包括 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 的其他实例。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to construct sophisticated layouts that adapt to changes at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 这样，你可以构造适应在运行时更改的复杂的布局。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control can expand to accommodate new controls when they are added, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 添加新控件时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控件可扩展以容纳新控件，具体取决于 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Setting either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> property to a value of 0 specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> will be unbound in the corresponding direction.
trans-unit.target: 将 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> 或 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> 属性的值设置为 0 指定将取消 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 在相应方向的绑定。

trans-unit.source: You can also control the direction of expansion (horizontal or vertical) after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control is full of child controls.
trans-unit.target: 在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控件充满子控件后，还可控制扩展的方向（水平或垂直）。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control expands downward by adding rows.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控件通过添加行向下扩展。

trans-unit.source: If you want rows and columns that behave differently from the default behavior, you can control the properties of rows and columns by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要使行和列的行为不同于默认行为，可以通过使用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A> 属性来控制行和列的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can set the properties of rows or columns individually.
trans-unit.target: 可分别设置行或列的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control adds the following properties to its child controls: `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控件将以下属性添加到其子控件中：`Cell`、`Column`、`Row`、`ColumnSpan` 和 `RowSpan`。

trans-unit.source: You can merge cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control by setting the `ColumnSpan` or `RowSpan` properties on a child control.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置子控件上的 `ColumnSpan` 或 `RowSpan` 属性来合并 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控件中的单元格。

trans-unit.source: To set the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetCellPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置`Cell`， `Column`， `Row`， `ColumnSpan`，和`RowSpan`属性在运行时，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetCellPosition%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To read the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetCellPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要读取`Cell`， `Column`， `Row`， `ColumnSpan`，和`RowSpan`属性在运行时，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetCellPosition%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The docking behavior of child controls is the same as other container controls.
trans-unit.target: 子控件的停靠行为等同于其他容器控件。

trans-unit.source: The anchoring behavior of child controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> differs from the behavior in other container controls.
trans-unit.target: 中的子控件的锚定行为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>与其他容器控件中的行为不同。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the child control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Left> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right>, the control will be placed against the left or right border of the cell, at a distance that is the sum of the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> property and the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果子控件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Left>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right>、 将针对该单元格的左或向右边框放置控件、 离的距离，是的控件的总和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>属性和面板的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Left> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right> values are set, the control will be sized to the width of the cell, with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> values taken into account.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Left>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right>设置值，该控件将大小调整为该单元格的宽度与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>考虑在内的值。

trans-unit.source: The behavior for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Top> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Bottom> anchoring is analogous.
trans-unit.target: 行为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Top>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Bottom>锚定相当。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Anchor and Dock Child Controls in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 定位点和停靠子控件，在 TableLayoutPanel 控件中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you need a child control to mimic the default anchoring behavior in other container controls, you can adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> properties to maintain a constant distance between the control's border and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要模拟其他容器控件中的默认锁定行为的子控件，你可以调整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>属性，以保持该控件的边框和单元格的边框之间的距离常量。

trans-unit.source: Setting the values of both the `Column` and `Row` properties of a child control to -1 will cause the control to be moved to the first empty cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值`Column`和`Row`为-1 子控件的属性将导致控件移动到的第一个空白单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件。

trans-unit.source: The empty cell will be chosen in a search that proceeds from left to right and from top to bottom.
trans-unit.target: 从左到右、 从上到下，将在搜索中，将继续选择空单元格。

trans-unit.source: This order is dependent on the culture, so it will behave correctly in right-to-left (RTL) layouts.
trans-unit.target: 此顺序是依赖于区域性的因此它将从右到左 (RTL) 布局中正确运行。

trans-unit.source: Only controls that have the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property set to `true` participate in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control's layout computations.
trans-unit.target: 具有的唯一控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>属性设置为`true`参与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件的布局计算。

trans-unit.source: Also see:
trans-unit.target: 另请参见：

trans-unit.source: [How to: Align and Stretch a Control in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-align-and-stretch-a-control-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：在 TableLayoutPanel 控件中对齐和拉伸控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-align-and-stretch-a-control-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)

trans-unit.source: [How to: Span Rows and Columns in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-span-rows-and-columns-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：在 TableLayoutPanel 控件中跨行和跨列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-span-rows-and-columns-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)

trans-unit.source: [How to: Edit Columns and Rows in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-edit-columns-and-rows-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：在 TableLayoutPanel 控件中编辑行和列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-edit-columns-and-rows-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)

trans-unit.source: [Walkthrough: Arranging Controls on Windows Forms Using a TableLayoutPanel](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-a-tablelayoutpanel.md)
trans-unit.target: [演练：使用 TableLayoutPanel 在 Windows 窗体上排列控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-a-tablelayoutpanel.md)

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.OnCellPaint%2A> method to create a custom appearance for a cell.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.OnCellPaint%2A>方法来创建一个单元格的自定义外观。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>为其默认值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for the panel.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置面板的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values describing the style of the border of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 描述面板的边框样式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the cell borders.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单元格边框的样式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle" /> values describing the style of all the cell borders in the table.
trans-unit.target: 描述表中所有单元格的边框样式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this value will cause the panel to redraw itself and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 设置此值将导致重绘自己和其内容面板。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A> property depending on the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A>具体取决于所选属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cell is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 在重绘单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> named `TableLayoutPanel1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>名为`TableLayoutPanel1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns in the table.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表中列的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 控件中列的数目。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: You can specify both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells.
trans-unit.target: 可以同时指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>属性与已知的和固定大量的单元格的布局。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property allows for such growth.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指定一个属性或其他如果你希望你的布局不断增长中的单元格的数目假定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>属性允许这种增长。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>为 0，面板会通过添加行，并且如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>为 0，面板会通过添加列。

trans-unit.source: Specifying panel growth with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property is preferred to setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> to 0, however.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用的面板增长<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>属性优于设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>为 0，但是。

trans-unit.source: Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以添加或删除从表使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of column styles for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 的列样式的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" /> containing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> for each column in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" /> 控件中每个列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A> property to access the style properties of specific columns.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A>属性来访问的样式属性的特定列。

trans-unit.source: You can use members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> class to set the characteristics of individual columns in the table.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用的成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>类来设置表中的各列的特性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control arranges its columns, it assigns priorities to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件排列其列时，它将优先级分配给每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>按以下顺序：

trans-unit.source: Columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute> are considered first, and their fixed widths are allocated.
trans-unit.target: 具有列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute>被视为分配第一个和其固定的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize> are sized to their contents.
trans-unit.target: 具有列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize>其内容调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Remaining space is divided among columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Percent>.
trans-unit.target: 剩余空间使用的列之间划分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Percent>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> properties of each column when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>各列的属性时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>单击。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of controls contained within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 内的控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection" /> containing the controls associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含与当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection" /> 关联的控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property contains all of the controls associated with the table, including controls that may not be currently displayed because of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> limitations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>属性包含的所有控件的表，包括不可能因当前显示的控件关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>限制。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例枚举中的所有子控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: 为控件创建控件集合的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: 分配给控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含在单元格中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示单元格的行号和列号的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the cell position.
trans-unit.target: 表示单元格位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" />。

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 的子控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the column position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定子控件的列位置。

trans-unit.source: The column position of the specified child control, or -1 if the position of <paramref name="control" /> is determined by <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定子控件的列位置，或者如果 <paramref name="control" /> 的位置由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine" /> 决定，则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: If `control` spans two or more columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> method will return the lowest column index.
trans-unit.target: 如果`control`跨两个或多个列，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>方法将返回最低的列索引。

trans-unit.source: The column position value is zero based, so you can use it as an index for the array returned by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnWidths%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你可以将它用作索引列位置的值是从零开始，通过返回的数组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnWidths%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法`Column`属性，该面板在设计时将添加到其子控件属性。

trans-unit.source: To get the actual position of `control`, even when its position is determined by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的实际位置`control`，即使其位置由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> and finds the column index for each control using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例枚举中的所有子控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>，为每个控件使用找到的列索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is not a type that can be arranged by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 不是此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> 可以排列的类型。

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 的子控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of columns spanned by the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定子控件跨的列数。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns spanned by the child control.
trans-unit.target: 子控件跨的列数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Column spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably wider than its peers.
trans-unit.target: 列跨越通常是用于定位的控件时显著高于其对等节点。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `ColumnSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法`ColumnSpan`属性，该面板在设计时将添加到其子控件属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A> methods to set the width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A>方法，以便设置的宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>中控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array representing the widths, in pixels, of the columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组，该数组表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 中的列的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the widths, in pixels, of the columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 的数组，它包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 中的列的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The column position of the control to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的控件的列位置。

trans-unit.source: The row position of the control to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的控件的行位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the child control occupying the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 返回占据指定位置的子控件。

trans-unit.source: The child control occupying the specified cell; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if no control exists at the specified column and row, or if the control has its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible" /> property set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 占据指定单元格的子控件；否则，如果在指定列和指定行没有控件存在，或者如果控件将其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="null" />，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The column and row position values are zero based.
trans-unit.target: 列和行的位置值是从零开始。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates all the cell positions in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> by looping through the columns and rows given by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, and then calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetControlFromPosition%2A> method to retrieve the control at each cell.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例枚举中的所有单元格位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>是循环遍历由给定的行和列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>，然后调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetControlFromPosition%2A>方法来检索控件在每个单元格。

trans-unit.source: Either <paramref name="column" /> or <paramref name="row" /> (or both) is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="column" /> 或 <paramref name="row" />（或两个都）小于 0。

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含在单元格中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the row and the column of the cell that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示包含此控件的单元格的行和列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the cell position.
trans-unit.target: 表示单元格位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> method returns the actual current position of `control`, even if its position is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A>方法返回的实际当前位置`control`，即使其位置由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method takes into account the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control state, including column or row spanning and when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A> has placed a control with its `Column` and `Row` properties set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会考虑整个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件状态，包括列或行跨越以及何时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>放入了一个其`Column`和`Row`属性设置为-1。

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to the situation in which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> return -1.
trans-unit.target: 这相当于的情况<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>返回-1。

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 的子控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the row position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定子控件的行位置。

trans-unit.source: The row position of <paramref name="control" />, or -1 if the position of <paramref name="control" /> is determined by <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 的行位置，或者如果 <paramref name="control" /> 的位置由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine" /> 决定，则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: If `control` spans two or more rows, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> method will return the lowest row index.
trans-unit.target: 如果`control`跨两个或多个行，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>方法将返回的最小的行索引。

trans-unit.source: The row position value is zero based, so you can use it as an index for the array returned by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowHeights%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 行位置的值是从零开始，以便你可以使用它作为索引为返回的数组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowHeights%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Row` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法`Row`属性，该面板在设计时将添加到其子控件属性。

trans-unit.source: To get the actual position of `control`, even when its position is determined by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的实际位置`control`，即使其位置由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> and finds the row index for each using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例枚举中的所有子控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>，为每个使用找到的行索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is not a type that can be arranged by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 不是此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> 可以排列的类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array representing the heights, in pixels, of the rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组，该数组表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 中的行的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the heights, in pixels, of the rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 的数组，它包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 中的行的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 的子控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of rows spanned by the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定子控件跨的行数。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows spanned by the child control.
trans-unit.target: 子控件跨的行数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Row spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably taller than its peers.
trans-unit.target: 跨越行是通常用于定位显著高于其对等方的控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `RowSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法`RowSpan`属性，该面板在设计时将添加到其子控件属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> methods to set the width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A>方法，以便设置的宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>中控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control should expand to accommodate new cells when all existing cells are occupied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当现有的所有单元格都被占用时，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 控件是否应该扩展以容纳新单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle" /> indicating the growth scheme.
trans-unit.target: 指示增长方案的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.AddRows" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.AddRows" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control expands downward by adding rows.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控件通过添加行向下扩展。

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to add a control to a full <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control, and the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.FixedSize>, then an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试将控件添加到完整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控制和的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.FixedSize>，则<xref:System.ArgumentException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property depending on the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>具体取决于所选属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>。

trans-unit.source: At run time, when the user clicks on the button labeled **Test GrowStyle**, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 在运行的时，当用户单击标记为的按钮**测试标签**、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control is full, it expands by adding a row or column, or it raises an exception, depending on the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件已满，通过添加行或列，它扩展或它引发异常，具体取决于值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The property value is invalid for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此属性值对于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle" /> 枚举无效。

trans-unit.source: Gets a cached instance of the panel's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取面板的布局引擎的缓存实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> for the panel's contents.
trans-unit.target: 面板内容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing the table layout settings.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示表的布局设置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings" /> containing the table layout settings.
trans-unit.target: 包含表的布局设置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings" />。

trans-unit.source: The property value is <see langword="null" />, or an attempt was made to set <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings" /> directly, which is not supported; instead, set individual properties.
trans-unit.target: 属性值为 <see langword="null" />，或尝试直接设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings" />，而这是不受支持的；相反，应该设置各个属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutCellPaintEventArgs" /> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 为事件提供数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutCellPaintEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Receives a call when the cell should be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 当单元格应该刷新时，接收调用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.OnCellPaint%2A> method to create a custom appearance for a cell.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.OnCellPaint%2A>方法来创建一个单元格的自定义外观。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains information about the panel to paint.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />，其中包含有关要绘制的面板的信息。

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 绘制面板的背景。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows in the table.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表中行的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 控件中行的数目。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: You can specify both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells.
trans-unit.target: 可以同时指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>属性与已知的和固定大量的单元格的布局。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property allows for such growth.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指定一个属性或其他如果你希望你的布局不断增长中的单元格的数目假定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>属性允许这种增长。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>为 0，面板会通过添加行，并且如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>为 0，面板会通过添加列。

trans-unit.source: Specifying panel growth with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property is preferred to setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> to 0, however.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用的面板增长<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>属性优于设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>为 0，但是。

trans-unit.source: Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以添加或删除从表使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of row styles for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 的行样式的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" /> containing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> for each row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" /> 控件中每行的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A> property to access the style properties of specific rows.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A>属性来访问特定行的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> class to set the characteristics of individual rows in the table.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用的成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>类来设置各行的特性表中。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control arranges its rows, it assigns priorities to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件排列其行时，它将优先级分配给每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>按以下顺序：

trans-unit.source: Rows with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute> are considered first, and their fixed heights are allocated.
trans-unit.target: 与行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute>被视为分配第一个和其固定的高度。

trans-unit.source: Rows with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize> are sized to their contents.
trans-unit.target: 与行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize>其内容调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Remaining space is divided among rows with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Percent>.
trans-unit.target: 剩余空间使用的行中划分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Percent>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> properties of each row when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>的每个属性时行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>单击。

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 控件边界的高度和宽度。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值之一，指定在定义控件大小和位置时要使用的控件边界。

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: 缩放控件的位置、大小、空白和边距。

trans-unit.source: The ratio by which to scale the control horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 水平缩放控件所依据的比率。

trans-unit.source: The ratio by which to scale the control vertically
trans-unit.target: 垂直缩放控件所依据的比率。

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of scaling the entire panel and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 执行缩放整个面板和任何子控件的工作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ScaleCore%2A> method uses the `dx` and `dy` parameter values to scale both the height and width of the panel independently.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ScaleCore%2A>方法使用`dx`和`dy`参数值进行独立扩展的高度和宽度的面板。

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含在单元格中的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 表示单元格的行和列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 设置表示单元格的行号和列号的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" />。

trans-unit.source: The control to move to another column.
trans-unit.target: 要移至另一列的控件。

trans-unit.source: The column to which <c>control</c> will be moved.
trans-unit.target: <c>control</c> 将移动到的列。

trans-unit.source: Sets the column position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定子控件的列位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A> method moves the control to another column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>方法将控件移到另一个列中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: The columns and rows have zero-based indexes.
trans-unit.target: 行和列具有从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Setting the column position to -1 specifies that the control will flow to the first empty cell.
trans-unit.target: 将列位置设置为-1，则指定此控件将流至第一个空单元格。

trans-unit.source: This method reapplies the table layout to all controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重新表布局应用到中的所有控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法`Column`属性，该面板在设计时将添加到其子控件属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A> method to swap two controls contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>方法来交换两个控件中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control with at least two rows.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>具有至少两个行控件。

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 的子控件。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to span.
trans-unit.target: 要跨的列数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of columns spanned by the child control.
trans-unit.target: 设置子控件跨的列数。

trans-unit.source: Column spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably wider than its peers.
trans-unit.target: 列跨越通常是用于定位的控件时显著高于其对等节点。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `ColumnSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法`ColumnSpan`属性，该面板在设计时将添加到其子控件属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A> methods to set the width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A>方法，以便设置的宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>中控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 小于 1。

trans-unit.source: The control to move to another row.
trans-unit.target: 要移至另一行的控件。

trans-unit.source: The row to which <c>control</c> will be moved.
trans-unit.target: <c>control</c> 将移动到的行。

trans-unit.source: Sets the row position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定子控件的行位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A> method moves the control to another row in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A>方法，将控件移动到中的另一行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件。

trans-unit.source: The columns and rows have zero-based indexes.
trans-unit.target: 行和列具有从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Setting the row position to -1 specifies that the control will flow to the first empty cell.
trans-unit.target: 将行位置设置为-1，则指定此控件将流至第一个空单元格。

trans-unit.source: This method reapplies the table layout to all controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重新表布局应用到中的所有控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Row` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法`Row`属性，该面板在设计时将添加到其子控件属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A> method to swap two controls contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>方法来交换两个控件中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control with at least two rows.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>具有至少两个行控件。

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 的子控件。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to span.
trans-unit.target: 要跨的行数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of rows spanned by the child control.
trans-unit.target: 设置子控件跨的行数。

trans-unit.source: Row spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably taller than its peers.
trans-unit.target: 跨越行是通常用于定位显著高于其对等方的控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `RowSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法`RowSpan`属性，该面板在设计时将添加到其子控件属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> methods to set the width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A>方法，以便设置的宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>中控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 小于 1。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to receive the extender properties.
trans-unit.target: 要接收扩展程序属性的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this object can provide extender properties to the specified object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此对象可以扩展程序属性提供给指定对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> 接口时使用。
